title: Anti virus bloackage assistance
body: This is to help those with a problem that can have serious ramifications. If you notice that you can open the launcher but when the actual game starts nothing happens and all you get is the reconnect screen and Everytime you hit reconnect nothing happens then your anti virus might be blocking the application from freely opening new windows. Now do that rush into fixing this as doing the wrong thing can get you perma banned. The simple solution is to go into your anti virus and add league of legends into you firewalls exclusions list so it will allow it to do what it needs to do, DO NOT DO THIS!!! I made this mistake and what I didn't realise was that this will pair league of legends with a 3rd party program which will get you permabanned. What you should do is simply find another anti virus that doesn't block league of legends. It might be a hassle but it's better than what happened to me. If I save one innocent player from a ban then this was worth my time. Learn from.my mistake friends. I do hope this helped you. If you are having further trouble with your anti virus contact the support desk of said anti virus but for the love of God just don't tell uch your league client, I cannot stress this enough

replies.body:
An antivirus would not trigger a 3rd party ban on your account. Adding an exception to your antivirus is the official solution for this issue. Either you were using an extremely sketchy antivirus or there is more going on here.

From your post I assume your account has been banned, I don't suppose you could expand on that?
I've made a post about my ban where I will be expanding on it and will be supplying all the evidence I have which I believe is quite convincing if you would like me to link it to you
I've already responded over in your other thread :)
